markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tactical Cadence](/Feats.aspx?ID=6362) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Prerequisites**
[Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=6356); [Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351)

</column>

---

Your remarkable breath control and concise instructions allow you to coordinate your allies more effectively, even in desperate situations. When you grant allies the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=89) condition using [Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=6356), they can use the extra action to either [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) or [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306), and they aren’t [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) 1 on their following turn if they use the extra action.
name: Tactical Cadence

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Tactical Cadence Source Player Core 2 pg. 205 1.1 Archetype Marshal Prerequisites Cadence Call; Marshal Dedication --- Your remarkable breath control and concise instructions allow you to coordinate your allies more effectively, even in desperate situations. When you grant allies the quickened condition using Cadence Call, they can use the extra action to either Stride or Strike, and they aren’t slowed 1 on their following turn if they use the extra action.
